Text: Happy Holidays from Datek Onlinemorning during the holidays and all over town The screens were still blank the PCs shut down Other investors were all snuggled deep in their beds While visions of stock quotes danced in their heads My wife and I without making a peep Had just awakened from a decent nights sleep When from my computer there came such a clatter I jumped from my bed to see what was the matter When what on the color screen did I view But my Streamercservice with quotes that were new Seeing all the new changes I knew in a flash That I should buy and sell now to manage my cash With a passioned frenzy I began to trade Anticipating the outcome of the decisions Id made As quick as a flash my results came into view Because of the speedy routing that Datek can do Then with a twinkle I saw all Id done I updated my portfolio in less than seconds I sighed contentedly and stood up with a smile And realized all Id done in such a short while I slipped back into bed with only one thing to say Happy trading to all and to all a good holiday You were emailed because you are a valued Datek Online customer or a current user of Datek Onlines Streamer If you would like to be removed from our list please go to mudtkdaspeGeraldNemecenroncom ExtendedHours Trading applies between AM and PM ET ExtendedHours Trading applies to Nasdaq limit orders only Most ExtendedHours orders are represented on the Island c ECN an affiliated brokerdealer System response and access times may vary due to market conditions system performance and other factors Datek Online Brokerage Services LLC member NASDSIPC CCD

Happy Holidays from Datek Onlinemorning during the holidays and all over town The screens were still blank the PCs shut down Other investors were all snuggled deep in their beds While visions of stock quotes danced in their heads My wife and I without making a peep Had just awakened from a decent nights sleep When from my computer there came such a clatter I jumped from my bed to see what was the matter When what on the color screen did I view But my Streamercservice with quotes that were new Seeing all the new changes I knew in a flash That I should buy and sell now to manage my cash With a passioned frenzy I began to trade Anticipating the outcome of the decisions Id made As quick as a flash my results came into view Because of the speedy routing that Datek can do Then with a twinkle I saw all Id done I updated my portfolio in less than seconds I sighed contentedly and stood up with a smile And realized all Id done in such a short while I slipped back into bed with only one thing to say Happy trading to all and to all a good holiday You were emailed because you are a valued Datek Online customer or a current user of Datek Onlines Streamer If you would like to be removed from our list please go to mudtkdaspeGeraldNemecenroncom ExtendedHours Trading applies between AM and PM ET ExtendedHours Trading applies to Nasdaq limit orders only Most ExtendedHours orders are represented on the Island c ECN an affiliated brokerdealer System response and access times may vary due to market conditions system performance and other factors Datek Online Brokerage Services LLC member NASDSIPC CCD

introduction of option trades for qualified customers Backed by an easytograsp online trading system and realtime option price chains Datek Onlines commission is per online option trade plus per contract Compare that price to the commissions charged by other brokerages If youve decided that options may be an appropriate part of reaching your financial goals apply now to trade options at Datek Online Wonder how quickly stock markets are making the move to fully decimalized trading Links to an Insite followup article identifies the more than stocks listed on the New York and American Stock Exchanges that became eligible for decimalized trading on September Qualified investors can now make decimalized equity and option trades of these stocks at Datek Online A provocative article from Motley Fool shows how a Bear Market might just be the ticket to that level playing field youve been dreaming of Want to learn about books that some people actually have time to read Check out the Motley Fools reviews of Peter Bernsteins Against the Gods The Remarkable Story of Risk and Robert Shillers Irrational Exuberance And if youve got the urge to dust off your thinking cap this months installment of Motley Trivia offers three toughbutfair corporate ID challenges And be sure to check out the next generation of Streamerc A free download from Datek Online can put the newly expanded capabilities of this realtime quote system right on your desktop Thanks for joining us again Please read on Datek Online Brokerage Services LLC Member NASD SIPC Please be aware that options are not suitable for all investors Click here to access the options risk disclosure document Characteristics and Risks of Standardized Options If you wish to receive a hard copy of this document please call Datek Online Customer Support at UDATEK or send your request by email to You may also write to us at Datek Online Brokerage Services LLC Wood Avenue South Iselin NY NEW FROM DATEK ONLINE ONLINE OPTION TRADING Qualified customers can now trade options through Dateks online system for just plus per contract Apply now Options are not suitable for all investors Click here to access the options risk disclosure document Characteristics and Risks of Standardized Options ARE BEAR MARKETS GREAT NEWS Most people dont think so But the pros at Motley Fool point out that a bearish dip in prices can make stocks more affordable for the average investor If you missed the boat on the bulls or want to go back for affordable seconds then ironically enough a downturn in your future might be something to cheer about more FOOLISH TRIVIA The top dog in your portfolio may not have started out with a pedigree Learn the amazing stories of how three of todays top companies got that way more MOTLEY FOOL BOOK
